## SfStablecoinStore.state property

The current store state.

**Signature:**

```typescript
get state(): SfStablecoinStoreState<T>;
```

## Remarks

Should not be accessed before the store is loaded. Assign a function to [onLoaded](./stablecoin-lib-base.sfstablecoinstore.onloaded.md) to get a callback when this happens.

See [SfStablecoinStoreState](./stablecoin-lib-base.sfstablecoinstorestate.md) for the list of properties returned.
